name: Wynaut

evolution.description: Wynaut can evolve into Wobbuffet at level 5 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 8 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Bright Pokémon. Wynaut can always be seen with a big, happy smile on its face. Look at its tail to determine if it is angry. When angered, this Pokémon will be slapping the ground with its tail.

abilities.name: Shadow Tag
abilities.description: Creatures within 50 feet of this Pokémon may not flee or switch out, except by item, Move, or ability.

abilities.name: Telepathy
abilities.description: This Pokémon cannot be damaged by its allies' attacks.
